ref: 8024 pākalá ʻ quite black ʼ TS., ʻ ripening, causing suppura- tion ʼ lex. [pāká -- ]
K. pail, pöl m. ʻ purulent matter, white pus (of a boil) ʼ;
P. pāil f. ʻ mangos spread in grass to be ripened ʼ, pāilī ʻ ripened in straw (of fruit) ʼ;
